name: All The King's Men (HighPixelLabs)
description:
This is a simple take on Rock, Paper, Scissors. Rock being the Axemen, Paper being the Skeleton, and Scissors being the Wizard. Goal of the game win the rounds against the AI. Each round, player can make a bet on how they will perform for the that round. If you guess correctly, The player will get a bonus for either winning or losing round. Game also comes with a python version as well. The python version was used as a base and reference for the Unity Game.  I hope you enjoy.

Click Buttons to choose options and press space during battle to skip.
